title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
cookingSteps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Drain pasta and mix with bacon.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
cookingSteps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
Prepare the masala gravy with tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Add cooked chicken to the gravy and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Pasta Carbonara
summary: Easy Italian dish made with pasta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, and bacon. Takes about 20 minutes to prepare.
cookingSteps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Cook bacon until crispy and chop into pieces.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta and bacon, then stir in egg mixture off the heat.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: Medium-difficulty dish featuring chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, and onions. Takes about 35 minutes to prepare.
cookingSteps: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in oil.
Add chicken and brown on all sides.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 2 minutes.
Add coconut milk and simmer until chicken is fully cooked.
Season with salt and serve hot with rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy stir fry with broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers.
cookingSteps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies perfect for dessert.
cookingSteps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk in sugar and eggs until smooth.
Fold in flour, cocoa powder, and salt.
Pour batter into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes and let cool before cutting.
